Package magellan.library.io.file

Class FileTypeFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • magellan.library.io.file.FileTypeFactory
  • public class FileTypeFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to create FileTypes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  FileTypeFactory.FileTypeChooser
      A FileTypeChooser selects single entry if multiple valid entries are found in a compressed file, e.g. multiple .cr files in a .zip file.
      static class  FileTypeFactory.NotUniqueEntryException
      A NotUniqueEntryException shall be thrown if there are multiple valid entries in a compressed file and none have been selected.
      static class  FileTypeFactory.NoValidEntryException
      A NotValidEntryException shall be thrown if there is no valid entry in a compressed file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      FileType createFileType​(java.io.File fileName, boolean readonly)
      Creates an InputStreamSourceFileType of the given file name.
      FileType createFileType​(java.io.File fileName, boolean readonly, FileTypeFactory.FileTypeChooser ftc)
      Creates an InputStreamSourceFileType of the given file name.
      FileType createInputStreamSourceFileType​(java.io.File url)
      Creates an InputStreamSourceFileType of the given file name.
      protected FileType createZipFileType​(java.io.File fileName, boolean readonly, FileTypeFactory.FileTypeChooser ftc)
      This method either loads a Zipfile and checks it content for a CR file or it creates a new Zipfile by using ZipOutputStream to create a new ZipFile with one entry.
      static FileTypeFactory singleton()
      Returns the sole FileTypeFactory (with respect to singleton pattern).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • createFileType

        public FileType createFileType​(java.io.File fileName,
                               boolean readonly,
                               FileTypeFactory.FileTypeChooser ftc)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Creates an InputStreamSourceFileType of the given file name.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the URL to the InputStream
        readonly - file shall be readonly
        ftc - a FileTypeChooser used if entry in compressed file is not unique.
        Returns:
        a FileType pointing to the given File.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • createZipFileType

        protected FileType createZipFileType​(java.io.File fileName,
                                     boolean readonly,
                                     FileTypeFactory.FileTypeChooser ftc)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        This method either loads a Zipfile and checks it content for a CR file or it creates a new Zipfile by using ZipOutputStream to create a new ZipFile with one entry. Actually this behaviour works only "sometimes"...wuuuha
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
